It is used in various Tesla models, including the Semi truck.
The platform's high voltage allows for faster charging and better efficiency.

citations.title: Tesla Vehicle Production & Deliveries and Date for ...
citations.summary: In Q4 2023, Tesla produced approximately 495,000 vehicles and delivered over 484,000, with Model 3/Y accounting for 476,777 units produced and 461,538 delivered. For the entire year of 2023, Tesla's total vehicle production reached 1.85 million, a 35% increase from the previous year, while deliveries rose by 38% to 1.81 million. The production and delivery figures for other models were 70,826 and 68,874, respectively, contributing to the overall growth.

citations.title: 10-K
citations.summary: The drive inverter in the vehicle converts direct current (DC) from the battery pack into alternating current (AC) to power three-phase induction motors and also converts AC from regenerative braking back into DC for battery storage, utilizing a high-performance digital signal processor with complex software. The Model S incorporates numerous components sourced from over 300 suppliers, predominantly single-source suppliers, with limited qualification of alternative sources for most components.

citations.title: Form 10-K
citations.summary: The article discusses the modular design of the powertrain and battery pack used in Tesla's Model S sedan and future electric vehicles, including the Model X crossover. This compact powertrain features fewer moving parts compared to traditional internal combustion engines, allowing for versatility in applications and integration into upcoming models. Additionally, the Model S incorporates numerous components sourced from over 200 global suppliers, predominantly relying on single-source suppliers for most parts.

citations.title: Supercharger
citations.summary: The Supercharger network features four charging stations capable of delivering a maximum power output of 350 kW. These stations are accessible 24/7, and pricing details are available for non-Tesla users. For assistance, a dedicated roadside support line is provided.

citations.title: Supercharger
citations.summary: Superchargers can provide up to 200 miles of range in just 15 minutes, making them a quick and efficient charging solution. Charging sessions are usually brief, as topping up beyond 80 percent is often unnecessary.

citations.title: Manufacturing
citations.summary: The manufacturing facility has the capability to produce over one million vehicles annually, alongside a range of energy products and battery cells. This extensive production capacity highlights the company's commitment to scaling its operations in the automotive and energy sectors.

TRL.rationale: The Tesla 800V platform is in use across multiple models, demonstrating advanced features and improved performance, indicating a high level of operational readiness.

MRL.rationale: Tesla has demonstrated full-rate production of the 800V platform, as evidenced by its implementation in various models and the reported growth in production.

CRAAP.rationale: The information is current and relevant, coming from authoritative sources within Tesla and the automotive industry, but may lack comprehensive accuracy due to the brevity of the summary.

Materiality.rationale: The 800V platform is crucial for Tesla's competitive advantage in the EV market, significantly impacting performance and charging efficiency, thus considered highly material.

ISSB.rationale: While the platform contributes to key performance indicators, specific sustainability metrics related to the 800V system are not fully detailed in the summary.

OTA_Compliance.rationale: Tesla's OTA capabilities are aligned with ISO 24089 and UNECE R156 standards, ensuring compliance with modern automotive software update requirements.
